Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
  tien_ho_hw4.Rectangle

public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
1.0, 19 February 2014 This program creates a class Rectangle to represent a rectangle by its vertices at the lower left corner and upper right corner.
Author:
Tien Thuy Ho

          Precondition: a and b are points.
